text: How to find/replace text in html while preserving html tags/structure
I use regexps to transform text as I want, but I want to preserve the HTML tags.

if I want to replace "stack overflow" with "stack underflow", this should work as 
expected: if the input is stack <sometag>overflow</sometag>, I must obtain stack <sometag>underflow</sometag> (i.e.

the string substitution is done, but the 
tags are still there...
